bearbrickProducts.name: BE@RBRICK Audio 400%
bearbrickProducts.headline: 400% Portable Bluetooth Speaker
bearbrickProducts.definition: A 400% BE@RBRICK portable speaker powered by the QUAD’360™ acoustic engine.
bearbrickProducts.description: A sculptural portable speaker that delivers an enveloping 360° presentation from a compact 400% silhouette.
bearbrickProducts.story: Built around the QUAD’360™ architecture with tweeters in the ears and dual woofers in the head, the Audio 400 turns a familiar collectible form into a room-filling sound object.
specs: Bluetooth® wireless playback; stereo link with a second unit
Battery up to ~6 hours; USB-C fast charge ~1.5 hours
